meanings.definition: To work together in a synergistic manner.
meanings.sent1: The team synergized their skills to complete the project.
meanings.sent2: The group synergized their ideas to come up with a creative solution.
meanings.sent3: The robots synergized their movements, creating a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent4: The music and lights synergized perfectly, creating a mesmerizing show.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients synergized to create a delicious and flavorful dish.

meanings.definition: To combine efforts for a greater effect.
meanings.sent1: The companies synergized their resources to launch a successful campaign.
meanings.sent2: The athletes synergized their training routines to improve their performance.
meanings.sent3: The superheroes synergized their powers to defeat the villain.
meanings.sent4: The colors synergized in the painting, enhancing its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The team synergized their strengths to overcome challenges together.
